entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High minus 1.
